subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja}} {{wp|Kalpa (aeon)}}
{{ja-kanjitab|こう|yomi=o}} {{IPAchar|/kopu/}} → {{IPAchar|/kofu/}} → *{{IPAchar|/kowu/}} → {{IPAchar|/koː/}} From {{bor|ja|ltc|sort=こう|-}} {{ltc-l|劫}}, short form of {{ltc-l|劫波}}, itself a [[transliteration]] of {{bor|ja|sa|sort=こう|कल्प||[[aeon]]}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|こう|hhira=こふ}}

# {{lb|ja|Buddhism|sort=こう}} ''[[kalpa]]'': a unit of time in [[Buddhist]] [[cosmology]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
Proverbs
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|烏賊の甲より年の劫|いか の こう より とし の こう}}
* {{ja-r|亀の甲より年の劫|かめ の こう より とし の こう}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|こう|hhira=こふ}}

# {{lb|ja|Go|sort=こう}} a position in which two [[alternating]] [[stone]]s can be [[capture]]d and [[recapture]]d [[indefinitely]]
